name: Henry Jackman
description: '''Henry Pryce Jackman''' (born 1 June 1974) is an English film and television music composer, music conductor and music arranger. He composed music for films such as ''[[Kong: Skull Island]]'', ''[[X-Men: First Class]]'', ''[[Puss in Boots (2011 film)|Puss in Boots]]'', ''[[Monsters vs. Aliens]]'', ''[[Captain Phillips (film)|Captain Phillips]]'', ''[[Kick-Ass (film)|Kick-Ass]]'', ''[[Kick-Ass 2 (film)|Kick-Ass 2]]'', ''[[Wreck-It Ralph]]'', ''[[Turbo (2013 film)|Turbo]]'', ''[[Big Hero 6 (film)|Big Hero 6]]'', ''[[Pixels (2015 film)|Pixels]]'', ''[[Ralph Breaks the Internet]]'', ''[[Ron's Gone Wrong]]'', ''[[Smurfs (film)|Smurfs]]'', ''[[The Interview]],'' ''[[Detective Pikachu (film)|Pok√©mon: Detective Pikachu]]'' and five [[Walt Disney Animation Studios]] films, as well as video games such as ''[[Battlefield 6]]'',''[[Uncharted 4: A Thief's End]]'', ''[[Uncharted: The Lost Legacy]]'' and ''[[Just Cause 3]]''. He has also collaborated with film directors such as [[Fergal Reilly]], [[Don Hall (filmmaker)|Don Hall]], [[Chris Miller (animator)|Chris Miller]], [[Rob Letterman]], [[Matthew Vaughn]], [[Seth Rogen]], [[Evan Goldberg]], [[Raman Hui]], [[Edward Zwick]], [[Russo brothers]], [[Jake Kasdan]], [[Sam Hargrave]] and [[Rich Moore]].
